1939-09-07.Event1: UK and France declare war on Germany

1939-09-12.Event1: Poland army is destroyed and the remaining ones try to flee towards Romania

1939-09-17.Event1: Soviet Union invades Poland from the East

1939-10-06.Event1: Polish resistence comes to an end
1939-10-06.Event2: Hitler declaring a desire for peace with UK and France

1939-10-07.Event1: British Prime Minister Chamberlain declines Hitler peace

1939-10-17.Event1: Portions of Poland are formally inducted into Germany

1939-10-22.Event1: Registration begins in UK to conscript all able-bodied males between 18-23

1939-10-28.Event1: More annexes of Germany from Poland territory

1939-11-04.Event1: Finland rejects giving land to URSS

1939-11-28.Event1: URSS attacks Finald and the Winter War begins

1939-12-05.Event1: URSS begin heavy attacks on the Mannerheim line

1939-12-11.Event1: Big defeats for the URSS in the Finland campaign

1939-12-16.Event1: URSS is expelled from the League of Nations in response to the invasion

1939-12-23.Event1: German Propaganda Minister Joseph Goebbels makes radio address reviewing the Nazi version of event in the 1939
1939-12-23.Event2: 1940 is presented in the Nazi media as 'will be a hard year,and we must be ready for it'

1940-01-04.Event1: Finland victories halt the soviet offensive

1940-01-09.Event1: German plane carrying plans for Fall Gelb crashes in neutral Belgium

1940-01-13.Event1: Captured documents reveal Hitlar's plans for invading Scandinavia and France untill spring

1940-01-18.Event1: The soviets are driven back in Finland and retailiate with heavy air attacks

1940-01-29.Event1: Germany makes final plans for the invasion of Denmark and Norway

1940-02-07.Event1: URSS agrees to suplly grain and raw material to Germany in a new trade treaty

1940-02-12.Event1: URSS army breaks through the Mannerheim Line

1940-02-19.Event1: Manstein presents to Hitler his plans for invading France via the Ardennes forest

1940-03-01.Event1: Soviets start attacks on Viipuri, Finland's second largest city

1940-03-07.Event1: Finland agrres to end the war under soviets terms

1940-03-14.Event1: Finland loses large territory that is anexed to the soviets

1940-03-19.Event2: Mussolini agrees to enter with the italian army the war 'at an opportune moment'

1940-03-25.Event1: UK and France makes formal agreement that neither country will seek a separate peace with Germany

1940-03-31.Event2: Molotov speaks about the Romanian Bassarabia

1940-04-18.Event1: British and French troups support Norway

1940-05-08.Event1: Nazi invades France and The Benelux
1940-05-08.Event2: Winston Churchill becomes Prime Minister of UK

1940-06-06.Event1: Winston Churchill delivers the speech about 'We will never surrender'

1940-06-11.Event1: Italy declar war on France and UK

1940-06-21.Event1: General De Gaulle forms a French government in exile

1940-07-06.Event1: Hitler begin plan to invade UK

1940-07-11.Event1: Battle of Britain begins with Luftwaffe raids on channel shipping

1940-07-19.Event1: 15 September is set for the UK invasion

1940-07-29.Event1: Failure to achieve air superiority results in a postpone of the invasion

1940-08-15.Event1: Luftwaffe suffers losses on UK airfields

1940-08-24.Event1: Churchill speech 'Never was so much owed by so many to so few'

1940-09-01.Event1: Luftwaffe halts attacks on Airfields and begins the attacking of London

1940-09-06.Event1: Hitler postpone the invasion of Britain

1940-09-18.Event1: England claim Victory over Germany with the failure to invasion of the Nazis

1940-09-30.Event1: The Tripartite Pact is signed by Germany Italy and Japan, their new name being AXIS

1940-10-07.Event1: Romania joins itself to fight alongside Germany

1940-10-14.Event1: UK invasion is postponed untill spring 1941

1940-10-20.Event1: Having stalled his advance in Egypt Mussolini invades Greece instead
1940-10-20.Event2: Hitler is furious about Mussolini decision

1940-11-09.Event1: Greece makes a counteroffensive over Italy

1940-11-16.Event1: Talks between the Axis and URSS to make the Axis power bigger

1940-11-30.Event1: UK and Germany performing bombing Raids between their cities

1940-12-07.Event1: British offensive against Italian troops over Egypt

1940-12-15.Event1: Francisco Franco rules out Spanish entry into the war

1940-12-20.Event1: Hitler begin planning Operation Barbarossa, the invasion of URSS

1940-12-28.Event1: Italy loses even more battles against the Greece army

1941-01-10.Event1: Lend-Lease introduces into the U.S. Congress

1941-01-16.Event1: URSS want's 1 more time to join the Axis but Hitler ignores them

1941-01-26.Event1: Germany agrees to send Reinforcements to Afrika

1941-02-08.Event1: Italy suffer terrible defeat in Africa

1941-02-20.Event1: German and British troups confront for the first time in Africa

1941-03-04.Event1: German U-boats are succesful in the Atlantic

1941-04-07.Event1: Pro Axis government is installed in Iraq

1941-04-23.Event1: Greece Prime Minister Alexandros Koryzis commits suicide

1941-05-08.Event1: Allies invade Iraq to limit German oil import

1941-05-27.Event1: The biggest german battleship Bismarck is sunk in the North Atlantic by the UK navy

1941-08-11.Event1: Hitler shifts some forces from the Moscow offensive

1941-08-31.Event1: British and Soviets troops invade Iran to save the Abadan oilfields

1941-10-16.Event1: Moscow citizens flee the city, however Stalin stays and demand a stubborn defense

1941-10-23.Event1: Red Army reinforcemens arrive in Moscow

1941-11-02.Event1: Stalin claimes that 4,5 mil. Germans have already died in Russia with a great exaggeration

1941-11-10.Event1: Temperatures aground Moscow drops to -12 degrees Celsius as both sides freeze

1941-11-17.Event1: The Germans attempt a pincher movement to encirle Moscow

1941-11-28.Event1: The German Troops reports spotting the Kremlin spires

1941-12-23.Event1: Rommel in retreat in North Africa as he awaits Reinforcements

1942-01-27.Event1: German Africa Corps renews offensive in North Africa

1942-02-11.Event1: Stiff German resistance halts the Red Army advance

1942-03-15.Event1: The germans begin building up for a 1942 Summer offensive in the east

1942-03-30.Event1: Stalin believes a German Attack towards Moscow will leave the south front undermanned

1942-04-11.Event1: Hitler wants more Italians in the est front

1942-04-20.Event1: Mussolini complies sending 7 divisions to the russian front

1942-05-01.Event1: Germany prepares a new Offensive in North Africa

1942-05-20.Event1: German counter offensive neutralises The Red Army Spearhead

1942-05-26.Event1: British and URSS agrees that no separate peace will be signed with Germany

1942-06-02.Event1: Allies bombardament hard the German cities

1942-06-11.Event1: Multiple German attacks destroys several Red Army units

1942-06-17.Event1: German Africa Corps attacks towards Egypt

1942-07-06.Event1: Stalin allows the Red Army to retreat avoiding large Enciclements

1942-07-19.Event1: German Army rushes to Stalingrad and Volga to cut off the URSS caucasian Supplies

1942-07-30.Event1: Stalin orders Directive nr 221; NOT A STEP BACK!

1942-08-08.Event1: German Offensive seems highly Effective as URSS disperse

1942-08-17.Event1: Lack of Munitions forces Rommel into a standstill

1942-08-11.Event1: Allies attacks back the germans troops

1942-08-16.Event1: Soviets Begin the implementation of the operation Uranus a setlement of Stalingrad

1942-10-05.Event1: British and ally forces trying to recover the Vichy France seized by the Germans

1942-12-11.Event1: Hitler allows withdrawal of forces from the Caucasus

1942-12-18.Event1: Germany fail to breaking the Soviet lines in Stalingrad

1942-12-25.Event1: The Luftwaffe attempts to supply the 6th Army in Stalingrad over air

1943-01-03.Event1: Fails to bring all the supplies

1943-01-14.Event1: The red army launches further offesnive against army group south

1943-01-23.Event1: New arrived Italian forces are overrun by Red Army

1943-01-29.Event1: New law in Germany, Man between 16-65 and woman between 17-50 open to mobilize for war

1943-02-15.Event1: Germans are fighting almost alone vs the Russians

1943-02-23.Event1: German propaganda minister Joseph Goebbels declares 'Total War'

1943-02-27.Event1: Brilliant counter attacks from Manstein destroys several Soviets Corps and stabilzez the front in the south

1943-03-08.Event1: Germany abandos the Rhzew salient to shorten their overextended frontline

1943-03-21.Event1: Allied attacks against the Axis in Tunisia

1943-03-31.Event1: Germany Army ordered to plan an Assault on the Kursk Salient

1943-04-07.Event1: Hitler and Mussolini meet at Salzburg

1943-04-25.Event1: Germany attempt to evacuate the forces in Tunisia but it fails

1943-05-05.Event1: Axis Forces in Africa begin to collapse

1943-05-15.Event1: Allied forces begins planning for an invasion of Italy

1943-05-19.Event1: Operation Citadel: Germany attack on the Soviet Kursk Salient is set for an early summer begin

1943-05-30.Event1: Operation is postponed for the arrivel of a new assault tank

1943-06-05.Event1: Hearing the postponed the Soviets have now plenty time to prepare

1943-06-20.Event1: Sicily bombed in preparation of Allied Landings

1943-07-06.Event1: Operation Citadel commences. Both sides suffer heavy casualties

1943-07-19.Event1: Hitler calls off Operation Citadel to send troops to Italy

1943-07-27.Event1: URSS send strong attacks on the exhaused German troops

1943-07-31.Event1: Mussloini is arrested and disposed as Dictator of Italy

1943-08-21.Event1: The tide war has shifted to Allies

1943-08-28.Event1: Italy seeks peace with the Allies
1943-08-28.Event2: German troups prepare to invade Italy

1943-09-13.Event1: Italy surrenders, German troops ocupy the country

1943-09-19.Event1: Mussolini is rescued by Germany and reinstalled as dictator in North Italy

1943-10-19.Event1: Allies forces in Italy come to a halt by the heavily defended Gustav Line

1943-11-03.Event1: Germany counter attacks fails to push the soviet back

1943-11-09.Event1: Kiev is liberated by the Red Army

1943-11-24.Event1: German counterattacks against Soviet Dniepr crossing unsucessfully

1943-12-21.Event1: Soviet offensive west of Kiev drives germans into a retreat

1943-12-28.Event1: Allied planners believe that Normandy, only lightly defended by Germans would be a target for landing

1944-01-13.Event1: The large Soviet Salient west of Kiev has split Army Group South from the remaining fonrt

1944-01-28.Event1: Red Army troops push the Germans away from Leningrad lifting the 873 day long siege

1944-02-01.Event1: The Soviets begin planning a large scale offesnive against German Army Group Center

1944-02-18.Event1: Invasion of France, Operation Overlord is confirmed

1944-02-20.Event1: Finish diplomats arrive in Moscow to negotiate peace terms

1944-03-06.Event1: Hitler anticipating an Allied invasion in France, reinforces the west flank

1944-03-17.Event1: With soviets offensive towards Romania he shifted troops from Army to south

1944-04-04.Event1: Stalin proposes harsh demands to Finish delegation. They refuse his terms

1944-04-22.Event1: Vast Allied building in Britain in preparation for Operation Overlord

1944-04-29.Event1: Despite heavy bombing German armament production sees new heights

1944-05-10.Event1: Allies start bombing logistical centers to soften up German battle preparednes in the West

1944-05-16.Event1: More than 130 Allied political leaders and military officers meet for Briefings on D-Day the coming month

1944-05-25.Event1: The battle for Monte Casione ends in Allied victory

1944-06-07.Event1: D-Day, the Allies land in Normandy France

1944-06-29.Event1: Soviet Operation Bagration begins. Army Group Center is taken off balance

1944-07-09.Event1: The Soviet advance completely destroys Army Group Center, leaving the Eastern Front wide open

1944-07-20.Event1: Col. Claus von Stauffenberg fails to assasinate Hitler

1944-08-11.Event1: Germany Army Group North scrambles to escape from the Baltics before it's destroyed

1944-08-19.Event1: Allies break through the German frontline, entering the French heartland

1944-08-26.Event1: Allies landings in Southern France. Romania Capitulates

1944-09-05.Event1: Hitler demands all French habors to be held at any cost for logistical problems

1944-09-23.Event1: Finland signs a peace treaty with Moscow at the cost of more territorial losses

1944-10-05.Event1: Allies meet stiffening German resistance on the western front

1944-10-09.Event1: Germany initiates an orderly retreat from Greece, to deploy their forces elsewhere

1944-10-17.Event1: Soviet forces cut off Army Group North in the Courland Cauldron

1944-10-22.Event1: Volkssturm; Hitler orders all remaining mailes aged 16-60 to immediately enter military service

1944-11-07.Event1: The Battle of Hurtgen forrest see both the Allies and Germans taking heavy losses for little gain

1944-11-13.Event1: Hitler demands planning of a new Offensive against the western allies

1944-11-20.Event1: Hitler leaves his war headquarters in East Prussia for Berlin

1944-11-29.Event1: Antwerp is now a major supply port for the onward moving Allies

1944-12-16.Event1: Germans attack in the Ardennes thus starting the Battle of the Bulge

1945-01-04.Event1: Budapest is surrounded, a longs and stubborn siege will begin

1945-01-06.Event1: Allies counter attack the German Ardennes positions

1945-01-13.Event1: Red Army resumes its offensive into Poland and East Prussia

1945-01-19.Event1: Hitler is now hiding in the Fuhrerbunker in Berlin with his companion Eva Braun

1945-01-25.Event1: Hitler orders cities to hold out as Fortress

1945-02-01.Event1: Red army Crosses the Oder river and nears Berlin

1945-02-08.Event1: The Yalta Conference of Roosevelt Churchill and Stalin begins to discuss how the influence of the word will be splitted

1945-02-17.Event1: Battle of the Budapest ends with Soviet victory

1945-02-23.Event1: German Effort shifts towards protecting Berlin against the Soviet threat

1945-03-03.Event1: Red Army attacks north and South to protect its flanks

1945-03-14.Event1: A small German offensive in Hungary ends with another Soviet victory

1945-03-23.Event1: The Allies move to encicle the industrial German Ruhr region

1945-03-31.Event1: The Allies slow down to let the Red Army to take Berlin

1945-04-17.Event1: Red Army finalizes plans to envelop and assault Berlin. Hitler promises a new Stalingrad

1945-04-27.Event1: Berlin is surrounded by the Red army
